long_description: Wear the lightweight Arc'teryx Aphix insulated jacket as a stand alone piece or as a cold-weather mid layer when you're skiing or snowboarding on dry days. Nylon exterior is insulated with warm 80g Coreloft(TM) insulation to trap heat; collar and hand pockets are insulated. Inset stretchy panels under the arms allow good range of motion without compromising warmth. Adjustable hem drawcord; zippered hand pockets; internal chest pocket. The Arc'teryx Aphix insulated jacket has an athletic fit.
short_description: Wear the lightweight Arc'teryx Aphix insulated jacket as a stand alone piece or as a cold-weather mid layer when you're skiing or snowboarding on dry days.
